short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Magnet keeps your workspace tidy by automatically tiling your windows.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Introducing Magnet, the automatic layout manager for Google Chromeâ„¢. Keep all of your windows neat and tidy and make the most out of your display space.

Whenever you want to tile your windows, simply activate Magnet by either clicking on the extension icon or using the keyboard shortcut Ctrl+Shift+P / Command+Shift+P at any time. When you create new windows, Magnet will automatically arrange them neatly.

Right-click the extension icon to manage preferences.
